Workflow.Name: Meeting Room Services - Notify Administrator When an Issue is Reported
Workflow.Description: When a user reports an issue with the meeting room, this workflow will automatically generate an email notification to the administrator(s). In case of any errors during the process, it will log a record in the EE(Employee Experience) Errors table.

LocalizedName.description: Meeting Room Services - Notify Administrator When an Issue is Reported

Description.description: When a user reports an issue with the meeting room, this workflow will automatically generate an email notification to the administrator(s). In case of any errors during the process, it will log a record in the EE(Employee Experience) Errors table.
